homophily 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Construct a graph object's mixing matrix.

Source: R/utils.R
as_mixing_matrix.Rd

Using a categorical vertex attribute, construct a matrix depicting network mixing patterns.

as_mixing_matrix(g, node_attr_name)

# S3 method for igraph
as_mixing_matrix(g, node_attr_name)

# S3 method for network
as_mixing_matrix(g, node_attr_name)

Arguments

g

  • <igraph>

    • <network>, if {intergraph} is installed.
node_attr_name

  • <chr>

  • The name of a node/vertex attribute in g.

Examples

as_mixing_matrix(jemmah_islamiyah, node_attr_name = "role")
#>                      
#>                       bomb maker command team operation assistant
#>   bomb maker                  10            1                   0
#>   command team                14            3                   4
#>   operation assistant          5            4                   1
#>   suicide bomber               1            0                   0
#>   Team Lima                    0            0                   0
#>                      
#>                       suicide bomber Team Lima
#>   bomb maker                       4         0
#>   command team                     1         4
#>   operation assistant              1         0
#>   suicide bomber                   0         4
#>   Team Lima                        0         6

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
